general.name: Trung Nguyen
general.headline: Fullstack Developer
about: I am a fullstack developer who loves creating efficient and scalable applications. My expertise lies in designing APIs, managing databases, and integrating systems. I am now enhancing my skills to transition into a DevOps Engineer role, where I am learning about cloud computing, automation, and managing infrastructure to deliver faster and more reliable software solutions. I believe in constantly improving my skills and aim to connect development and operations to achieve great results.
I enjoy exploring new technologies and using them to build better applications. For me, programming languages, libraries, and frameworks are simply tools that help me achieve my goals.
I may not know everything, but I am dedicated to solving problems and learning as I go.

experiences.title: Back-end Developer Intership
experiences.description: Developing, and maintaining scalable back-end applications using Python, FastAPI, Golang, Elasticsearch, and MySQL.

education.subject: Software Engineering
education.description: Major in Software Engineering with a strong focus on back-end development and system design.
honors: Top 100 Software Engineering Students of the Semester (2024)

volunteering.description: Together with my brother Cuong and my sister Diem, I organized and contributed to distributing food, essential items, toys, and school supplies to underprivileged children. Our goal was to bring joy and support to children in challenging circumstances, ensuring they could enjoy a meaningful and memorable Mid-Autumn Festival.

projects.name: Kit Stem Hub Website
projects.description: A web platform providing interactive educational kits. Customers can request technical support for their labs, and staff members assist accordingly.

projects.name: E-Commerce Website
projects.description: An e-commerce platform where customers can browse and purchase products, similar to Shopee or Lazada.
